This is a serverless authentication server built with AWS Cognito, TypeScript, and the Serverless Framework. The project includes:

- Authentication handlers for login, registration, and token validation
- User management endpoints
- JWT token operations with Cognito integration
- GitHub Actions for CI/CD deployment
- Proper TypeScript configuration and error handling

When working on this project:
- Use TypeScript for all source code
- Follow serverless framework conventions
- Implement proper error handling and validation
- Use AWS SDK v3 for Cognito operations
- Maintain security best practices for authentication
